name: Terminal Infiltration
description: Delve deep into a computer system as a virus, wanting to infiltrate the most secure depths of the system. However, the firewall defenses are there to block your path. What do you do? Why, change their source code to be more on your side! By utilizing the Terminal System, you can change the properties of enemies, objects, and even yourself to more easily traverse the digital landscape. Can you make it to the system depths?
